Title: CS-25 LH₂ Fuel Tank Certification
Problem_Statement: EASA CS-25 does not currently address LH₂ fuel systems; Special Conditions required for certification pathway
Regulatory_Driver: CS 25.981 Fuel tank integrity; CS 25.863 Flammable fluid fire protection

Title: Hydrogen Safety Certification Approach
Problem_Statement: Novel certification approach needed for H₂ safety systems including detection, ventilation, and emergency procedures

Title: Tank Structural Qualification
Problem_Statement: Cryogenic composite tank structural qualification test matrix and acceptance criteria need definition for certification

Title: Refueling Interface Standardization
Problem_Statement: Airline operational requirements mandate ≤30 min refuel time and standardized ground interface

Title: Tank Installation/Removal Requirements
Problem_Statement: Airlines require tank removal without major structural disassembly for maintenance and end-of-life

Title: Environmental Compliance LH₂
Problem_Statement: Life cycle environmental impact assessment required including production pathway and end-of-life
Regulatory_Driver: EU sustainability regulations; airline ESG requirements
